name: volge0
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cvol, c0)))

stmt.origin: breqtrrd(nat0, cle, cfv(cvol, c0), cfv(covol, c0), wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)))
stmt.pretty: breqtrrd(nat0, cle, (vol ` c0), (vol* ` c0), c0 ∈ dom(vol))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cvol, c0)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(covol, c0)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wceq(cfv(cvol, c0), cfv(covol, c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ dom(vol)→ 0[≤](vol ` c0))
⊣ (c0 ∈ dom(vol)→ 0[≤](vol* ` c0))
⊣ (c0 ∈ dom(vol)→(vol ` c0)=(vol* ` c0))
